column6:
*raining
value:0
rate:30?10
description:
raining cats and dogs / still raining / raining / starting to clear off / about to stop raining

e:OnHours
update(raining, +1)

OnValue:$rate
update(raining, 0)
disable(rain)
write(it stopped raining)
enable(sky)
column7:
sky
value:0
description:
clear / clear / cloudy / getting cloudier / all gray / gonna rain

e:OnHours
update(sky, +1)

OnValue:50
update(raining, 0)
enable(raining)
disable(sky)
triggerEvent(OnRain)
